thread.title: Colleen
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Colleen

author: Colleen
title: Colleen
text: We visited the Arenal and Guanacaste areas in January and Aaron Vanacek helped us to coordinate a fabulous trip! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Hotel Nayara and it's beautiful surroundings. We didn't have to worry about a thing. A few days later, we left for Guanacaste and the coast, a completely different, yet amazing time at Villa Buena Onda. If we decide to visit the area again, we'll definitely work with him again. He didn't miss a beat!
